comments:
(Eclipse 3.1.2, also seen on 3.1.1)

Copied from bug #80291:

(...)
This is rather rare, but I found a funny way to reproduce:

- open e.g. some .java files from project "foo"
- delete the "foo" project (but do *not* hit the [OK] button by now)
- move the mouse to the [X] of the workbench
- now press [OK] and instantly try to click the [X] to close the workbench ;-)

Result:
